item.description: I'm hosting a game day at my home in Concord, NH, starting at 1 pm and running until 8 pm or so. I run a website about board games, BoardgameNews.com, and have a number of games that I'd like to review for the site, but the games that hit the table will depend on who shows up for gaming. RSVP with an arrival time if you're in. If you want to play particular games, suggest them! I have hundreds of games on hand, so we'll never be short of games to play...
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
